home.logged-in: You are logged now logged in. With this account, you have the following permissions:

archive.write: Write access to the archive service

user.write: Write access to users in the authentication service

login.title: Login
login.two-factor-desc: Enter a code from the Authenticator app on your mobile device

register.title: Register user
register.download-desc: Before you can complete registration you have to setup an authenticator app for generating login codes. The Google Authenticator app is recommended, but any TOTP (Time-based one-time password) based app works.
register.qr-desc: Use the authenticator app from the previous step to scan the QR code below:
register.secret-prefix: You can also enter this code
register.verify-desc: The last step is to enter a code generated by the app to verify that everything is correctly setup.

new-app.title: Connect new app
new-app.desc: By connecting an app you allow that app operate on your behalf, limited to the permissions below. You can revoke this permission at any time.

oauth-error.title: Something went wrong
oauth-error.missing-claims: Server failed to verify user login status
oauth-error.invalid-scope: The logged in user is not allowed to request this permission

totp-setup.already-setup: Two factor authentication is already setup

register.invalid-password: Password is invalid, 8 or more characters is needed
register.invalid-confirmed-password: Password is invalid, 8 or more characters is needed
register.password-mismatch: Confirmed password does not match password
